cause.description:
we believe that in spreading the word about the kyoto protocol .The kyoto protocol is regarding something that will eventually affect us . global warming.We have to spare a thought about the generations after us , how they will have to deal with a world full of natural disasters and unpredictable climates, won't you lend a hand ?
1. environment
2. global warming
cause.mission: create public awareness about excessive greenhouse gas emission
cause.name: kyoto protocol
